verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mpeni Mungu mali
yake. x2
Mpeni Bwana haki
yake. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Leteni vipaji kwa Bwana,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Mkate kiini cha ngano,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Divai tunda la mzabibu,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nazo nafaka za mashamba,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Na kazi ya mikono yetu,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Nayo mapato ya mashamba,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sisi ni mali yake Bwana,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Tutoe nafsi zetu kwake,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
Nayo furaha na uchungu,
mpeni Bwana haki yake.
